alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 24 at 10:46PM CDT until March 25 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHICKASAW...SOUTHERN ITAWAMBA AND MONROE COUNTIES... At 1046 PM CDT, a confirmed large and extremely dangerous tornado was located over New Wren, or 8 miles southeast of Okolona, moving northeast at 60 mph. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. TAKE COVER NOW! HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be destroyed. Considerable damage to homes, businesses, and vehicles is likely and complete destruction is possible. Locations impacted include... Amory, Aberdeen, Okolona, Smithville, Prairie, New Salem, New Wren, Hatley, Gattman, Quincy, Turon, Egypt, Wise Gap, Wren, McCondy, Buena Vista, Sipsey Fork, Becker, Splunge and Athens. TORNADO...OBSERVED TORNADO DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
